articles.title: ISSF World Championships 2023: Indians aim for 48 Olympic quotas up for grabs - The Bridge
articles.description: India has so far booked three quota places. A total of 48 Olympic quota places will be for grabs at the World Championships in Baku.
articles.content: The ISSF World Championships are starting on August 14 in Baku, Azerbaijan. A 22-member Indian squad, comprising rifle and pistol shooters, will eye securing Olympic quotas and fine-tuning their perf… [+3302 chars]
